MSJ_ERROR_PERMISO_NO_EXISTENTE: This permission does not exist in our database.
MSJ_ERROR_PERMISO_EXISTENTE: This permission already exists in our database.
MSJ_ERROR_PERMISO_PADRE_NO_EXISTENTE: No action can be taken, the parent does not exist in our database.
MSJ_ERROR_PERMISO_TIENE_PERMISOS_HIJOS: No action can be taken, this permission contains child permissions.
MSJ_ERROR_PERMISO_TIENE_IS_ASSIGNED: No action, this permission is assigned.
MSJ_ERROR_PARAMETRO_LISTA_NO_ENVIADO: Remember that you must send the parameters page, limit.
MSJ_ERROR_PARAMETRO_NO_EXISTE: The search parameter {field} does not exist in the database.
MSJ_ERROR_PARAMETRO_CAMPO_FILTRO_NO_ENVI: You must send the field parameter by which you want to filter.
MSJ_ERROR_PARAMETRO_CAMPO_PAGE_NO_ENVIAD: You must send the page parameter by which you want to filter.
MSJ_ERROR_PARAMETRO_CAMPO_LIMIT_NO_ENVIA: You must send the limit parameter by which you want to filter.
